title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.29 - Speed limit in port area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.29 - Speed limit in port area

State Regulations

Any person operating or driving a motor vehicle or other
vehicle within the port area shall operate and drive the same at a careful and
prudent speed, not greater than is reasonable and proper, having due regard to
traffic, surface and use of the property, and at all times subject to the rules
and regulations of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
